name: San Clemente
shortDescription: A coastal city known for its Spanish-style architecture, beautiful beaches, and vibrant downtown.
fullDescription: San Clemente offers a charming blend of coastal living and historic architecture. Famous for its stunning ocean views, surfing spots, and Mediterranean-inspired buildings, this city is a favorite for families and outdoor enthusiasts alike. With a lively downtown featuring boutique shops, restaurants, and cultural events, San Clemente combines small-town charm with modern amenities. Easy access to major highways makes it a convenient location for commuters.
heroImageAlt: Sunset view of San Clemente coastline and pier

neighborhoods.name: Talega
neighborhoods.description: Master-planned community with golf courses, parks, and family-friendly amenities.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Golf course and homes in Talega

neighborhoods.name: North Beach
neighborhoods.description: Popular coastal neighborhood with beach access, surfing spots, and restaurants.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Beachfront and surfboards at North Beach

neighborhoods.name: Mariner's Mile
neighborhoods.description: Waterfront commercial area with shops, dining, and marina access.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Marina and waterfront dining at Mariner's Mile

highlights.title: San Clemente Pier
highlights.description: Iconic pier offering fishing, dining, and panoramic ocean views.

highlights.title: Casa Romantica
highlights.description: Historic Spanish-style estate and cultural arts center overlooking the ocean.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Casa Romantica estate with ocean view

highlights.title: Beaches and Surfing
highlights.description: World-class surfing spots and sandy beaches ideal for sunbathing and recreation.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Surfers riding waves at San Clemente beach

highlights.title: Downtown San Clemente
highlights.description: Charming area with boutique shops, restaurants, and regular community events.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Downtown San Clemente street with shops and cafes

faqs.question: What is San Clemente known for?
faqs.answer: San Clemente is known for its beautiful beaches, Spanish-style architecture, and the iconic San Clemente Pier.

faqs.question: How are the schools in San Clemente?
faqs.answer: The city is served by the Capistrano Unified School District, which includes several highly rated schools.

faqs.question: What outdoor activities are popular in San Clemente?
faqs.answer: Residents and visitors enjoy surfing, hiking coastal trails, fishing, and beach activities.

faqs.question: How is the commute from San Clemente?
faqs.answer: San Clemente offers easy access to the I-5 freeway, with commute times typically ranging from 30 to 60 minutes to major Orange County and Los Angeles job centers.
